title: Duchess Meghan wears chic white shirt dress to close out royal tour
text:
Another day, another great look from Meghan Markle. What are the odds?

Interested in Royal Family? Add Royal Family as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Royal Family news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

One of her final looks during the 10-day royal tour to South Africa included a chic belted white shirt dress that paired perfectly with nude-toned pumps and red earrings.

Karwai Tang/WireImage/Getty Images

She wore this dress for her visit to YES which is a Johannesburg-based organization that gives back to black youth and creates new work opportunities for them.

Markle changed into the shirt dress after wearing a sleeveless Nonie Trench Coat Dress that was belted as well.

She was initially spotted wearing this dress in 2018 to the Nelson Mandela Centenary Exhibition.

Facundo Arrizabalaga/EPA via Shutterstock

This neutral-toned dress is available for pre-order on the brand's website for $825.

Throughout Duchess Meghan and Prince Harry's time away, we have seen her in everything from a chic jumpsuit to playful prints.
description: Meghan Markle wore a chic white shirt dress for the conclusion of her and Prince Harry's 10-day tour to South Africa.
